remarks: Excluded middle property of ` DVecH ` vector space closed subspace join.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2014.)
statement:
djhexmid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhexmid.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhexmid.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhexmid.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhexmid.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhexmid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X C_ V ) -> ( X .\/ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = V ) $.
